testcase.name: EDINET.valid
testcase.description: EDINET.valid: These variations are valid EDINET filings. They are not expected to produce any errors.

variation.name: valid01
variation.description: Sample filing. 01_開示府令-有価証券届出書 01_Disclosure Ordinance-Securities Registration Statement

variation.name: valid02
variation.description: Sample filing. 02_開示府令-有価証券報告書 02_Disclosure Ordinance-Securities Report

variation.name: valid03
variation.description: Sample filing. 03_開示府令-IFRS有価証券報告書 03_Disclosure Ordinance-IFRS Securities Report

variation.name: valid04
variation.description: Sample filing. 04_開示府令-半期報告書（第四号の三様式、銀行業） 04_Disclosure Ordinance-Semi-Annual Report (Form 4-3, Banking Industry)

variation.name: valid05
variation.description: Sample filing. 05_開示府令-半期報告書（第四号の三様式、建設業） 05_Disclosure Ordinance-Semi-Annual Report (Form 4-3, Construction Industry)

variation.name: valid06
variation.description: Sample filing. 06_開示府令-半期報告書（第五号様式、鉄道業） 06_Disclosure Ordinance-Semi-Annual Report (Form 5, Railway Industry)

variation.name: valid07
variation.description: Sample filing. 07_開示府令-発行登録書 07_Disclosure Ordinance-Shelf Registration Statement

variation.name: valid08
variation.description: Sample filing. 08_開示府令-発行登録追補書類 08_Disclosure Ordinance-Shelf Registration Supplement

variation.name: valid09
variation.description: Sample filing. 09_開示府令-臨時報告書 09_Disclosure of the Government Order-Interim Report

variation.name: valid10
variation.description: Sample filing. 10_特定有価証券府令-有価証券届出書 10_Specific Securities Ordinance - Securities Registration Statement

variation.name: valid11
variation.description: Sample filing. 11_特定有価証券府令-有価証券報告書【みなし有価証券届出書】 11_Specific Securities Ordinance - Securities Report [Deemed Securities Registration Statement]

variation.name: valid12
variation.description: Sample filing. 12_特定有価証券府令-半期報告書【みなし訂正有価証券届出書】 12_Specific Securities Ordinance - Semiannual Report [Deemed Amended Securities Registration Statement]

variation.name: valid13
variation.description: Sample filing. 13_特定有価証券府令-発行登録書 13_Specific Securities Ordinance - Shelf Registration Statement

variation.name: valid14
variation.description: Sample filing. 14_特定有価証券府令-発行登録追補書類 14_Specific Securities Ordinance - Shelf Registration Supplement

variation.name: valid20
variation.description: Sample filing. 20_開示府令-訂正有価証券報告書 20_Disclosure Ordinance-Amendment of Securities Reports

variation.name: valid21
variation.description: Sample filing. 21_特定有価証券府令-訂正有価証券届出書 21_Specific Securities Ordinance-Amendment of Securities Registration Statement

variation.name: valid22
variation.description: Sample filing. 22_特定有価証券府令-訂正有価証券報告書【みなし訂正有価証券届出書】 22_Specific Securities Ordinance-Amendment of Securities Report [Deemed Amendment of Securities Registration Statement]
